body_html:
I had similar issue with this magical number 32. Length of the sequence which i passed into rnn was always 70 but bidirectional rnn worked only when i set manually max length to 32. In other case tf hangs. I changed parallel_iterations argument to 71 (max size + 1) and it is working.

Unfortunately i have no idea if number of parallel iterations affects somehow the results and how does the performance changes looks like but if I see such problems, expect the worst.

Previous code:
outputs, _ = tf.nn.bidirectional_dynamic_rnn(lstm_fw_cell, lstm_bw_cell, rnn_input, dtype=tf.float32)

New code:
outputs, _ = tf.nn.bidirectional_dynamic_rnn(lstm_fw_cell, lstm_bw_cell, rnn_input, dtype=tf.float32, parallel_iterations=71)

body:
I had similar issue with this magical number 32. Length of the sequence which i passed into rnn was always 70 but bidirectional rnn worked only when i set manually max length to 32. In other case tf hangs. I changed `parallel_iterations` argument to 71 (max size + 1) and it is working.

Unfortunately i have no idea if number of parallel iterations affects somehow the results and how does the performance changes looks like but if I see such problems, expect the worst.

Previous code:
`outputs, _ = tf.nn.bidirectional_dynamic_rnn(lstm_fw_cell, lstm_bw_cell, rnn_input, dtype=tf.float32)`

New code:
`outputs, _ = tf.nn.bidirectional_dynamic_rnn(lstm_fw_cell, lstm_bw_cell, rnn_input, dtype=tf.float32, parallel_iterations=71)`
